name: Moppit Prototype #1
description:
>>> Feedback Form Here! <<<

Please fill out the form and give some feedback about the experience!

Controls:

  1. WASD to move
  2. Space to jump
  3. E to pick up the red cubes/ mess objects
  4. Mouse controls camera

Best played with mouse and keyboard.

Known Bugs:

- Getting too close to the cubes will sometimes prevent picking them up.

- Cubes clipping through walls.
